message.content:
cs.HC, cs.SE, cs.DB, cs.PL, cs.AI 

Reasoning: 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is the most likely category as the paper discusses the drawbacks of the standard spreadsheet user-interaction paradigm and proposes an alternative paradigm for better user experience. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering) is also likely as the paper discusses the difficulties in spreadsheet creation and maintenance, and proposes a software system to address these issues. 
- cs.DB (Databases) is relevant as the paper discusses the underlying business models represented by spreadsheets and the need for easy comprehension. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages) is relevant as the paper proposes a new paradigm for automated generation of spreadsheets from plain-language business model descriptions. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is less likely but still possible as the paper discusses the potential benefits of the proposed paradigm, which could include improved efficiency and accuracy through automation.
